seaWave.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. State of the sea waves. Enum:'low, moderate, high'

occupationNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total number of people on the beach.

occupationLane.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Total number of bikes on the bike lane.

seaTemperature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Celsius degrees'. Sea surface temperature.

envTemperature.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Celsius degrees'. Enviroment temerature.
